featured.text: According to a recent marketing study, young adults influence 88% of household clothing purchases.
Or telephone Ms. (2) Have interest or experience in marketing Chang at 2945-0027 for an immediate interview.

Even though 65% of teens claim that they rely on themselves for their fashion ideas, it is estimated that less than 20% of the teen population is innovative enough to drive fashion trends, according to a recent study by a marketing firm.
What is the best title for this passage? (A) The Importance of Marketing (B) The Power of Youth Culture (C) The Popularity of Hip-hop Fashion (D)

definition.zh_def: 市場營銷：促進產品或服務銷售的活動和過程。
definition.en_def: The activities and processes involved in promoting and selling products or services.
definition.example: The company invested heavily in marketing to reach a wider audience.
